game.name: Pancakes
game.pieces: The pieces in this puzzle are pancakes of varying width. One side of the pancake is cooked nicely, while the other side is burnt.
game.tomove: Each turn, the player can choose to flip the top n pancakes. When selecting a move, the selected pancake and all pancakes above it will be flipped over.
game.towin: The goal of the puzzle is to arrange the stack of pancakes in descending order of width, with all of the burnt sides facing down.
game.variants: The variants of this puzzle are defined by the number of pancakes in the stack.
